bug.author: livc
bug.summary: 官网中文教程的一个错误
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:http://www.paddlepaddle.org/doc_cn/build_and_install/install/docker_install.html#docker>这个中文教程</denchmark-link> 中的 <denchmark-code>docker run -it paddledev/paddlepaddle:cpu-latest </denchmark-code>
应为 <denchmark-code>docker run -it paddledev/paddle:cpu-latest </denchmark-code>
